name: SEX HELP
description:
SEX HELP - is an erotic game in the genre of "Arkanoid", in which you will have to break the cubes and gradually discover really beautiful and hot images.
The essence of this game is incredibly simple. All you have to do is to control the platform and do not let the ball touch the floor. This game will suit all those who like to enjoy simple gameplay, which will never make you bored!

What is remarkable about this game?
- Really simple gameplay.
- Beautiful images.
- Relaxing soundtrack.
- Enjoyable game experience.
